subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Luol Deng scored 26 points and Joakim Noah added 17 points and 9 rebounds as the Bulls beat the Boston Celtics, 93-86, in Chicago.
snippet: Luol Deng scored 26 points and Joakim Noah added 17 points and 9 rebounds as the Bulls beat the Boston Celtics, 93-86, in Chicago.
